pr_title: feat(upsampling) - Support upsampled error count with performance optimizations

ground_truth_bugs.description: Non-deterministic hash() in cache key causes cross-process inconsistency
Upsampling eligibility check uses outer dataset instead of scoped_dataset

golden_false_positives.reasoning: No code in the PR's changed files checks sample_rate with a falsy comparison. The sample_rate handling in event_manager.py (which uses strict inequality) is not part of this PR.
